channel.title: Pvp Zone help (with images)
channel.description:
This is pissing me off. If you can post your code for this fix. please do i have been trying to fix this for ages. Here is the image. I try to attack some one buy cant because of level in wild its -49 can some one help me change that number
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/703/pvphelprsps.png/][IMG]http://img703.imageshack.us/img703/8921/pvphelprsps.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]

item.title: Pvp Zone help (with images)
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:3, topic:406223”]Add this in client.java

} else if (YourMethodInPlayer.java()) { getPA().walkableInterface(197); getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@ANYTHING HERE", 199); getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);[/quote]
Post that under your inPcBoat, and the method in player.java. You must’ve added a method in player.java like

public boolean inFunPk() { if(absX > 2582 && absX < 2602 && absY > 3152 && absY < 3171 || absX > 2601 && absX < 2607 && absY > 3156 && absY < 3171){ return true; } return false; }

Read full topic
